companyDescription: Cyron Intelligence is an enterprise-grade API security platform featuring real-time threat detection, machine learning-based traffic analysis, and comprehensive monitoring capabilities. Built as a solo developer demonstrating full-stack security expertise.
achievements: Built enterprise-grade API security platform as solo developer demonstrating full-stack expertise
Implemented real-time threat detection with ML-based traffic analysis achieving sub-50ms latency requirements
Developed ApplicationCore and AnalysisEngine microservices with Minimal APIs pattern
Built Blazor Server dashboard with real-time UI and authentication flows
Designed complex PostgreSQL + TimescaleDB schema for time-series security data
Implemented Redis Streams for messaging and rate limiting infrastructure
Created ensemble threat detection models using XGBoost/LightGBM with ONNX cross-platform inference
Built cyron-agent-nova reverse proxy in Go with inline blocking capability
Developed cyron-agent-gamma Nginx/Lua module for traffic mirroring
Implemented zero-trust security patterns with HMAC-SHA256 webhook validation and AES-256-GCM PII encryption
Set up comprehensive CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for multi-environment deployment
Integrated GreyNoise API for threat intelligence enrichment with STIX 2.1 indicator management
